EmailTemplate.name: FICO 680 Launch
EmailTemplate.subject: The power of the sun, at 681
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Effective immediately, BlueWave is accepting FICO scores of 681+ for all our loan products.
Your success means quality solar for more homeowners. It's that simple.
Excited? We hope so.
Login to your BlueWave portal and start selling today.
BlueWave Login
More questions? <insert link to contact>
Thanks for joining us to make 'Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality.
